fields.detail:
I'm one half of the Friendli (this app you're using now!) team.
Interested in all the kinds of security -- cyber and physical.
I live in Melbourne.
I'm vegan.
I'm a relentless optimiser -- of everything :)
fields.ask_me:
* GrapheneOS, and generally getting Google off your phone.
* The threats humans pose to future non-human intelligences.
* The time I had breakfast with Bruce Schneier at DEFCON.
* What you can do to stop losing things.

fields.detail:
One half of the team that made Friendli (this thing you're using).

Django dev, security hobbyist, privacy enthusiast, with a very varied work background. I'm one of those self-taught devs with an arts degree. Looking to find ways to bring more people into my working life, through either community/user-facing work or people management.

I'd like to see more justice, equity, and kindness in the world. Feminist, not terfy. 

For fun, I paint acrylics and watercolours, read sci-fi and mysteries, bake, dance and learn unnecessary things.

Mastodon @keira_reckons@aus.social
fields.ask_me:
Relevant: 
 - hacker cons around the world (Disobey, CCC, DefCon, Diana, HOPE, BSides, KawaiiCon, BuildStuff, FOSDEM and more)
 - django
 - people management
 - that time we met Bruce Schneier for breakfast, and,
 - Friendli.

Less relevant / past work lives: 
 - long term travel logistics
 - volunteer wrangling
 - vegan cooking and nutrition
 - gym programs
 - vegetable gardening
 - charity regulation in Australia
fields.teach_me:
- How you figured out what you wanted to do.
 - Your neck of the security or tech world
 - Food where you're from.
